mapper.sql: SERVICE_ID, CODE, SERVICE_TYPE, BRIEF, STATE, CUSTOMER, SERVICE_REQUIREMENT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, ASSIGN_TO, ASSIGN_DATE, SERVICE_HANDLING, HANDLE_BY, HANDLE_DATE, HANDLE_RESULT, SATISFY_RATE
mapper.select: select S.SERVICE_ID as SERVICE_ID, S.CODE as CODE, S.SERVICE_TYPE as SERVICE_TYPE, S.BRIEF as BRIEF, S.STATE as STATE, S.CUSTOMER as CUSTOMER, S.SERVICE_REQUIREMENT as SERVICE_REQUIREMENT, S.CREATE_BY as CREATE_BY, S.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, S.ASSIGN_TO as ASSIGN_TO,U.USER_NAME as ASSIGN_TO_NAME, S.ASSIGN_DATE as ASSIGN_DATE, S.SERVICE_HANDLING as SERVICE_HANDLING, S.HANDLE_BY as HANDLE_BY, S.HANDLE_DATE as HANDLE_DATE, S.HANDLE_RESULT as HANDLE_RESULT, S.SATISFY_RATE from t_services S LEFT JOIN t_user U on S.ASSIGN_TO = U.USER_ID where S.SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_services where SERVICE_ID in
#{item}

mapper.update:
update t_services
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SERVICE_TYPE = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRIEF = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUSTOMER = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_REQUIREMENT = #{serviceRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ASSIGN_TO = #{assignTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_DATE = #{assignDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SERVICE_HANDLING = #{serviceHandling,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDLE_BY = #{handleBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDLE_DATE = #{handleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HANDLE_RESULT = #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SATISFY_RATE = #{satisfyRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_services set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SERVICE_TYPE = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRIEF = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUSTOMER = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_REQUIREMENT = #{serviceRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ASSIGN_TO = #{assignTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGN_DATE = #{assignDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SERVICE_HANDLING = #{serviceHandling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLE_BY = #{handleBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLE_DATE = #{handleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HANDLE_RESULT = #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SATISFY_RATE = #{satisfyRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
